description.value:
You fight just as well on the ground as you do standing up. While you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone], you are always @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Take Cover]{Taking Cover} against ranged attacks, you ignore the status penalty on your attack rolls from being prone, and you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Trip].

You can choose to move up to half your Speed when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Crawl]. You can instead move up to your full Speed when you Crawl, but if you do, you must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:6] or your body deteriorates.
